parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
From a compound of eu and prosopon; to be of good countenance, i.e. to make a display.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To force, compel, constrain, urge. From anagke; to necessitate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To cut around, circumcise. From peri and the base of tomoteros; to cut around, i.e. to circumcise.
Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
